verses.verse: Come <WH3212>, and let us return <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; for he hath torn <WH2963>, and he will heal <WH7495> us <WH5221>; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up <WH2280>.
After two days <WH3117> will he revive <WH2421> us <WH7992>: on the third day <WH3117> he will raise us up <WH6965>, and we shall live <WH2421> before him <WH6440>.

And let us know <WH3045>, let us follow <WH7291> on to know <WH3045> Jehovah <WH3068>: his going forth <WH4161> is sure <WH3559> as the morning <WH7837>; and he will come <WH935> unto us as the rain <WH1653>, as the latter <WH4456> rain <WH3384> that watereth the earth <WH776>.

O Ephraim <WH669>, what shall I do <WH6213> unto thee <WH3063>? O Judah, what shall I do <WH6213> unto thee <WH2617>? for your goodness is as a morning <WH1242> cloud <WH6051>, and as the dew <WH2919> that goeth early <WH7925> away <WH1980>.

Therefore have I hewed <WH2672> them by the prophets <WH5030>; I have slain <WH2026> them by the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>: and thy judgments <WH4941> are as the light <WH216> that goeth forth <WH3318>.
For I desire <WH2654> goodness <WH2617>, and not sacrifice <WH2077>; and the knowledge <WH1847> of God <WH430> more than burnt-offerings <WH5930>.
But they like Adam <WH120> have transgressed <WH5674> the covenant <WH1285>: there have they dealt treacherously against me <WH898>.
Gilead <WH1568> is a city <WH7151> of them that work <WH6466> iniquity <WH205>; it is stained <WH6121> with blood <WH1818>.

And as troops <WH1416> of robbers wait <WH2442> for a man <WH376>, so the company <WH2267> of priests <WH3548> murder <WH7523> in the way <WH1870> toward Shechem <WH7926>; yea <WH6213>, they have committed lewdness <WH2154>.
In the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> I have seen <WH7200> a horrible thing <WH8186>: there whoredom <WH2184> is found in Ephraim <WH669>, Israel <WH3478> is defiled <WH2930>.
Also <WH3063>, O Judah, there is a harvest <WH7105> appointed <WH7896> for thee <WH7725>, when I bring back the captivity <WH7622> of my people <WH5971>.
